moves.2... e6: Now I am at a complete loss.
moves.3. c4 c5: I know this is a known position, but not for me as black.
moves.4. Nf3 Nc6 5. Be2: Passive. I am not sure about this move.
moves.5... Qb6: I try to take advantage. But I overlook d5,
moves.6. O-O: He doesn't play it, he wants to play sure.
moves.6... d5: With a lot of complications I cannot handle, but I hope my opponent won't, either :-)
moves.7... Be7: Passive, but I thought that I could handle every possible exchange from white. But I am not sure about that.
moves.8. Ng5: Will be the kingside my fate? I can take the offered pawn since after cxd, exd, Nxd, Be3, e5 holds, or Qxd, QxQ (forced), NxQ, Be3 is not a threat anymore. But I couldn't see all this during the game, so I played...
moves.8... O-O: White is still undeveloped, so I took my chances.
moves.9. f4: Launching an attack but losing tempo for developement.
moves.9... h6: All this time I completely forgot about the d4 pawn... :-)
moves.10. Nf3: Now I cannot take it anymore! :-(
moves.10... Ne4: A nice outpost, to block white's kingside intentions.
moves.11. Nc3: Can you imagine? I missed NxN!
